changed.1: Commands to include more robust permission checking where necessary

added.1: Allow the passing of raw user IDs
added.4: Member roles are throughly checked before executing commands

changed.2: Inline parameters into messages are now passed in a cleaner manner

added.2: User searching, additional to id parsing
added.3: Channel searching, addition to id parsing

added.4: Users are now disconnected from their voice channel upon mute

added.2: Custom command triggers are now deleted once successfully posted
added.3: Updated the discordjs package which fixes some nice things such as 'Ignore voice states referencing an invalid channel' and 'GuildMembers removed from their VoiceChannel when leaving the guild'
added.4: A user's total record count is now displayed when adding a warning or mute (Total count includes all active warnings, mutes and bans)
added.5: Removed ability to clear notes as Support
added.6: Ban detection now shows all bans that a username matches against with a similarity of >0.5

changed.1: Altered ban message delivered to recipient via DM
Excluded Moderators from bad word filtering
changed.3: >remindme now works and doesn't leak your reminders to other people
changed.4: Mee6 commands ported over to Logger
